  • Method Details

    • style

      public static String style(String text, String ansiCode)
      Styles a string by wrapping it with the given ANSI code.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to style
      ansiCode - the ANSI code for color or formatting
      Returns:
      styled text that resets after printing

    • color

      public static String color(String text, String color)
      Convenience for just coloring text.
      Parameters:
      text - text to color
      color - a color constant from this class
      Returns:
      colored text or original text if disabled

    • header

      public static String header(String title)
      Build a pretty header line with color.
      Parameters:
      title - the header title
      Returns:
      formatted header string
